name: Guest List Manager
description: Designed for our InterNations Ambassadors and Consuls, the Guest List Manager allows event organizers to create a professional experience from the moment guests arrive. By quickly checking in attendees, you can reduce queues and get your event off to a great start.   Review all the events youre hosting  See attendees for each event at a glance  Use name search or QR code tickets to check in guests  Quickly report and review event statistics  Please note, this app is only available to InterNations volunteers. It will be gradually rolled out to all of our 390 communities, and your InterNations contact person will notify you when its available in your community.  InterNations (http://www.internations.org) is the largest global network and information site for people who live and work abroad. With a dedicated website and over 5,000 events and activities each month, we help people feel at home faster.
